title: Quiz based on: 1.3 Array Operations | Deletion from Array | Explanation with Code | Data Structure

questions.question: What is the primary data structure discussed in this video for performing array operations, particularly focusing on deletion?
questions.explanation: The video primarily discusses the use of arrays for array operations, including deletion. Arrays are a fundamental data structure in Java and are suitable for simple indexing-based operations.
